title: You and your pets will enjoy life at Aster Meadow Apartments! Pet friendly!
neighborhood: Vadnais Heights - Near Bridgewood Park & White Bear Lake
posting_body: ['Welcome to Aster Meadow Apartments!', '4143-4145 Centerville Rd Vadnais Heights, MN 55127', 'Rental Size:', '1 BR - 1 BA - 814 - 909 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1540 - $1685 |', 'Lease Length:', 'Variable, Monthly, 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'Aster Meadow luxury apartments is a brand new building that offers the perfect balance of sophisticated lifestyle and prime location in Vadnais Heights.', 'Our spacious living arrangements combine luxurious comfort with first-class amenities - such as heated, underground parking, conference rooms, a 24/7 fitness center, movie theater, and a stunning heated courtyard and grill area for entertaining.', 'Choose from studio, 1 and 2 bedroom dwellings, all with beautiful plank flooring, quartz countertops, in-unit washer/dryers, modern cabinetry, and an inviting view that welcomes you home.', 'Our community features:', '◾ Bike Racks', '◾ Controlled Access', '◾ Emergency Maintenance', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ FOB Controlled Building Access', '◾ Game Room', '◾ Garden Plaza', '◾ Outdoor Courtyard', '◾ Playground', '◾ Walking/Biking Trails', '◾ 16-Acre View Of Natural Wetland', '◾ Heated Gazebo', '◾ Heated Underground Parking', '◾ Huge Covered Decks', '◾ Large Grill Area', '◾ Media Center/Movie Theatre', '◾ On Site Management & Maintenance', '◾ Party Room', '◾ Pet Wash Station', '◾ Private Offices', 'Our unit features:', '◾ Balcony/Patio', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Central Heating & Cooling', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Eat-in Kitchen', '◾ Oven', '◾ Pantry', '◾ Refrigerator', '◾ Wi-Fi', '◾ Den', '◾', 'Extra Large Walk-In Closets', '◾ Gorgeous View', '◾ Granite/Quartz Countertops', '◾ High-Speed Internet Access: Cable & Century', 'OnLink Ready', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Stainless Steel Appliances', '◾ Storage Lockers Available', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'Dogs & Cats Allowed.', 'Maximum Dogs: 2, Maximum Cats: 1, Maximum weight: 60 lbs., Initial fee: 300, Additional rent: $50, Deposit: $300', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '69A708EFC8A749FF']
